name: TransportMovement
description: Activity to describe transports; replaces the TransportSegment in v1.1 and above

columns.name: checkActions
columns.description: References to CheckActions performed for the Activity

columns.name: contactDetails
columns.description: Information about contactDetails

columns.name: contactPersons
columns.description: References to Actors (Person; NonHumanActor) acting as contacts

columns.name: executionStatus
columns.description: Enum stating the status of the Activity

columns.name: servedServices
columns.description: Reference to Services this Activity is executed for

columns.name: checks
columns.description: References to the CheckActions performed on the object

columns.name: events
columns.description: Events object

columns.name: externalReferences
columns.description: References to all associated ExternalReferences

columns.name: skeletonIndicator
columns.description: Indicator whether a logistics object is a skeleton object

columns.name: arrivalLocation
columns.description: Reference to the arrival Location

columns.name: co2Emissions
columns.description: References to CO2Emissions

columns.name: departureLocation
columns.description: Reference to the depature Location

columns.name: distanceCalculated
columns.description: Information about the calculated distance

columns.name: distanceMeasured
columns.description: Information about the measured distance

columns.name: fuelAmountCalculated
columns.description: Information about the calculated fuel amount

columns.name: fuelAmountMeasured
columns.description: Information about the measured fuel amount

columns.name: loadingActions
columns.description: References to all actions of type Loading performed for the TransportMovement

columns.name: modeCode
columns.description: Mode of transport code; refer to UNECE Rec. 19 https://unece.org/fileadmin/DAM/cefact/recommendations/rec19/rec19_1cf19e.pdf

columns.name: modeQualifier
columns.description: Pre-Carriage; Main-Carriage or On-Carriage

columns.name: movementTimes
columns.description: Information about times related to the movement (milestone list to be defined)

columns.name: operatingTransportMeans
columns.description: Reference to the TransportMeans operating the TransportMovement

columns.name: fuelType
columns.description: e.g. Kerosene; Diesel; SAF; Electricity [renewable]; Electricity [non-renewable]

columns.name: seal
columns.description: Seal identifier

columns.name: transportIdentifier
columns.description: Airline flight number; or rail/truck/maritime line id
